mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.caiwubaoxiao_uuid_number as caiwubaoxiaoUuidNumber ,a.caiwubaoxiao_name as caiwubaoxiaoName ,a.caiwubaoxiao_photo as caiwubaoxiaoPhoto ,a.caiwubaoxiao_types as caiwubaoxiaoTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.caiwubaoxiao_content as caiwubaoxiaoContent ,a.caiwubaoxiao_yesno_types as caiwubaoxiaoYesnoTypes ,a.caiwubaoxiao_yesno_text as caiwubaoxiaoYesnoText ,a.caiwubaoxiao_shenhe_time as caiwubaoxiaoShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.bumen_types as bumenTypes ,yonghu.zhiwu_types as zhiwuTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM caiwubaoxiao a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.caiwubaoxiao_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.caiwubaoxiaoUuidNumber},'%')
and a.caiwubaoxiao_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.caiwubaoxiaoName},'%')
and a.caiwubaoxiao_types = #{params.caiwubaoxiaoTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.caiwubaoxiao_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.caiwubaoxiaoContent},'%')
and a.caiwubaoxiao_yesno_types = #{params.caiwubaoxiaoYesnoTypes}
and a.caiwubaoxiao_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.caiwubaoxiaoYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.caiwubaoxiao_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.caiwubaoxiaoShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.caiwubaoxiao_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.caiwubaoxiaoShenheTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.bumen_types = #{params.bumenTypes}
and yonghu.zhiwu_types = #{params.zhiwuTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
